summary: Marriage is a special bond between two people, often called spouses, which is recognized by society and sometimes by the law. It's like a promise to support and care for each other and any children they might have. Marriage can be different in various cultures and religions. Some places have rules about who can marry, like not allowing people of different races or the same sex to wed. There are also different types of marriage ceremonies, like big weddings or secret ones called elopements.
title: Marriage
